title: MBMBaM 438: Face 2 Face: The Ham Up There
description: As we prepare for our hometown holiday extravaganza, we present to you our recent live show from Denver, CO! It was a rowdy one, y’all. We suspect that everyone in the room had been visited that night by their city’s nightmare airport horse, and had been driven into a state of pure, horrified ecstasy.
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
